title: Introducing "MegaMouth"
paragraphs: Our latest version of a CatchCounter is named "MegaMouth" and for good reason.

Our past models included "The Original" and later "BigMouth". Both were great models for panfish but we found the need to count larger fish such as Slab Crappie, Monster Gills, White Bass and Walleye.

title: MegaMouth Features:
paragraphs: A 60% larger throat and chute than BigMouth
A user-adjustable return sprint tensioner that allows for different counting flap resistance.
A new injection-molded design for strength and quick easy cleanup.
MegaMouth still mounts to cooler and bucket lids.

title: About Catch Counter LLC
paragraphs: Catch Counter LLC is a company that manufactures and sells devices used to help Fishermen keep a count of fish caught.
These devices are built modular to allow the user a choice of where and how to mount.
Most mounts are on a cooler or a bucket lid but can mount on any flat surface such as a live well.
